definition: to explode/to set off an explosion/to detonate

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil

sentences.english: It can be the most advanced initiation system with development of information technology.
sentences.chinese: 随着信息技术的发展，它将成为最先进的起爆系统。

sentences.english: The fragment impact initiation of the charge covered with a thin plate was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究破片对薄盖板装药的冲击起爆问题。

sentences.english: The calculation and the analysis of reliability which dupication crossover initiation network of Nonel are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了导爆管复式交叉起爆网路可靠性的计算与分析。

sentences.english: A large amount of amorce was needed.
There is a box of blasting caps in the shed over there, so be careful.
sentences.chinese: 那边的小屋里有一箱起爆雷管，当心点儿。

sentences.english: A safe initiation system is of great importance to engineering blasting.
sentences.chinese: 安全起爆系统对于工程爆破是极为重要的。

sentences.english: The regularity of fragments dispersion of the warhead under asymmetrical multi spots initiation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究战斗部偏心多点起爆条件下破片径向飞散规律。

sentences.english: The shock-to-detonation transition (SDT) of insensitive high explosives (IHE) is researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍了钝感炸药的冲击起爆过程。

sentences.english: A new non primary explosive electric detonator with only high explosive adopted was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种只采用猛炸药的非起爆药电雷管。

sentences.english: The thesis aims to study on safety design of transportation devices for primary explosive powder.
sentences.chinese: 设计了起爆药运输装置，并完善附属结构。

sentences.english: The function of omnidirectional contact detonation is required in contact fuzes used on many ammunitions.
sentences.chinese: 许多弹药配用的触发引信要求具有万向触发起爆功能。

sentences.english: Without the detonator codes, those older nukes were no more dangerous than paperweights.
sentences.chinese: 没有起爆编码，这些老式的核弹头还不如镇纸危险。

sentences.english: The re-initiation phenomenon of gaseous detonation in a heart-shape tube was numerically studied.
sentences.chinese: 针对心形管内气相爆轰二次起爆过程进行了数值研究。

sentences.english: Right to save less left little, controlled the initiators, but has not been seen less left.
sentences.chinese: 右少为救左少，控制了起爆器，但左少己不见踪影。

definition: to ignite/to light a fire/to agitate/to start an engine/ignition/fig. to stir up trouble
fuse (for an explosive device)/electrical lead/intermediary/catalyst/(dialect) sewing needle
to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
